mapper.sql: systemOrg.id as id , systemOrg.org_num as orgNum , systemOrg.org_name as orgName , systemOrg.org_abbreviation as orgAbbreviation , systemOrg.status as status , systemOrg.pid as pid , systemOrg.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , systemOrg.user_name as userName , systemOrg.contact_name as contactName , systemOrg.contact_phone as contactPhone , systemOrg.province as province , systemOrg.city as city , systemOrg.area as area , systemOrg.address as address , systemOrg.remark as remark , systemOrg.valid as valid , systemOrg.creator_id as creatorId , systemOrg.create_time as createTime , systemOrg.updator_id as updatorId , systemOrg.update_time as updateTime , systemOrg.remark1 as remark1 , systemOrg.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into system_org_tb
id,
org_num,
org_name,
org_abbreviation,
status,
pid,
hierarchy_id,
user_name,
contact_name,
contact_phone,
province,
city,
area,
address,
remark,
valid,
creator_id,
create_time,
updator_id,
update_time,
remark1,
remark2,
#{id},
#{orgNum},
#{orgName},
#{orgAbbreviation},
#{status},
#{pid},
#{hierarchyId},
#{userName},
#{contactName},
#{contactPhone},
#{province},
#{city},
#{area},
#{address},
#{remark},
#{valid},
#{creatorId},
#{createTime},
#{updatorId},
#{updateTime},
#{remark1},
#{remark2},
mapper.update:
update system_org_tb
org_num = #{orgNum},
org_name = #{orgName},
org_abbreviation = #{orgAbbreviation},
status = #{status},
pid = #{pid},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
user_name = #{userName},
contact_name = #{contactName},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
area = #{area},
address = #{address},
remark = #{remark},
valid = #{valid},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT systemOrg.id, systemOrg.pid, systemOrg.org_name orgName, systemOrg.org_num orgNum, systemOrg.hierarchy_id hierarchyId FROM system_org_tb systemOrg where 1=1

SELECT systemOrg.id id, systemOrg.pid pid, systemOrg.org_name orgName, systemOrg.org_num orgNum, pSystemOrg.org_name parentOrgName, systemOrg.contact_name contactName, systemOrg.contact_phone contactPhone, systemOrg.update_time updateTime FROM system_org_tb systemOrg LEFT JOIN system_org_tb pSystemOrg ON systemOrg.pid=pSystemOrg.id
SELECT COUNT(systemOrg.pid) FROM system_org_tb systemOrg LEFT JOIN system_org_tb pSystemOrg ON systemOrg.pid=pSystemOrg.id
